entry.title: change to templates/youtube on Project Renard
entry.content:
Changed pages: templates/youtube
Changed by: zaki.mughal
Commit type: git
Date: 08:43:50 PM 04/27/2016
Remove the URI scheme from YouTube template
This allows it to use whatever the current page is using (http or https).

entry.title: change to README.md on Project Renard
entry.content:

Date: 01:38:48 PM 04/26/2016

entry.title: change to templates/youtube on Project Renard
entry.content:
Changed pages: templates/youtube
Changed by: zaki.mughal
Commit type: git
Date: 11:36:55 AM 04/26/2016
YouTube embedding should use HTTPS
This avoids a MITM attack due to mixing HTTPS with embedded HTTP
content. Without this fix, Firefox would give a "Blocked loading mixed
active content" error.
